job_tasks.phrase: Design and development on Miro canvas components
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the creation and enhancement of software components within the Miro product.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: This involves the integration of models, specifically generative AI models, into existing product components, which is a core aspect of modeling work.

job_tasks.phrase: Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on enhancing and developing APIs, which falls under traditional software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in defining and implementing the technical direction, which requires understanding business goals and translating them into technical plans.

job_tasks.phrase: Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring others implies a significant communication and knowledge-sharing component, aligning with collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: help to significantly shape Miro's Core product
Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team

classification.rationale: The role explicitly mentions integrating 'generative AI models' with core user flows and shaping the collaboration workspace. While it includes software development tasks like API improvements, the primary focus on generative AI integration and its application within a product strongly aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile.
